events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
Classified the customer issue as a refund request due to receiving an incorrect product.
Assigned case to refund specialist agent to handle the customer's refund request promptly.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear you received the wrong item. Iâ€™ll be helping you with the refund process today.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue?
Sure, my order number is 789654321 and here is a photo showing the wrong item that was delivered to me.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Thank you for the prompt response. I appreciate you resolving this quickly and look forward to the refund.
The refund process has been confirmed and is now complete. Please allow a few days for the amount to appear in your account.
Just following up to ensure you received your refund and if you need any further assistance with your order.
Since your refund has been processed and confirmed, we are now closing this support case. Thank you for contacting us.
We have sent you a short survey to gather feedback on your support experience. We appreciate your input!
